comments.author: dkmeller1

comments.text:
+dkmeller1 WMD (noun): A chemical, biological or radioactive weapon capable 
of causing widespread death and destruction.

Invisible (adjective): Unable to be seen; not visible to the eye.

You don't seem to understand words very well. A weapon used to disperse 
deadly radiation is in fact a WMD and radiation is invisible. What part of 
this can you not comprehend? He was in the process of producing a weapon 
that would emit deadly radiation in groups of Muslims. What part of this is 
far-fetched? A high concentration of radiation is fatal. Creating a device 
that disperses high amounts of radiation make them WMDs. Killing in the 
name of a political agenda is terrorism. Do you understand English?
comments.author: Fryday

comments.text:
+Fryday"You have a person building a weapon of mass destruction..."

Go back to your comic books, your television programming, and your 
playpen, for Heaven's sakes!

 Nobody is "building an invisible X-ray cannon", and even such a suggestion 
(in the name of fighting so-called "terrorism") is insulting to me as an 
adult American.

Isn't it just a little bit insulting to you to even be confronted by 
such ridiculous and farfetched scenarios, especially from the likes of 
proven liars like the FBI,and proven lunatics like the KKK?

Meanwhile serious and possibly irreversible damage is being done to the 
USA's legal, constitutional and judicial framework, to say nothing of any 
 constructive and sound foreign policy, by a "war-on-terror" which may well 
be making us MORE vulnerable then we would otherwise be.
comments.author: dkmeller1

comments.text:

this is as act of terrorism? The only imbecile here is yourself. Or is it 
that you have no idea that such weapons exist because they are globally 
banned for use against both combatants and civilians for being "inhumane"? 
Not to mention that projectile launching firearms are far more cheaper, 
smaller and effective.

countries that get involved with them and we are just so filled with our 
own propaganda that most of us believe what the idiot box in the living 
room tells us. We complain that North Korea are brainwashing their 
citizens, but how many of us know it is happening to us too? We just get 
brainwashed to believing the illusion of freedom when our rights keeps 
getting taken away.
Nowhere is free, unless you find an island where you don't have to pay 
taxes or deal with rights violations from the police and government. The 
idea of a free country in itself is an illusion. You are still a slave to

increasing tax rates.)
Oh, and we aren't doing anything wrong in Afghanistan and everywhere else 
we can't stop invading, because we act like civilized human beings, unlike 
everyone else.
Seriously, this world is screwed. The USA is going to shit and when that

magnetosphere needed to protect that surface from solar wind and cosmic 
radiation.
